# NexusTask - High-Performance Distributed Task Execution Engine

## What is NexusTask?

NexusTask is a production-ready C++20 framework for building high-performance, distributed task execution systems. It provides lock-free data structures, intelligent work-stealing schedulers, and enterprise-grade task orchestration capabilities.

## Quick Start

```bash
git clone https://github.com/yourusername/nexustask.git
cd nexustask
mkdir build && cd build
cmake ..
make
./task_engine_demo
```
